definition: Leningrad, name of Russian city Saint Petersburg 聖彼得堡|圣彼得堡 1923-1991
to arrange/to line up/file/series/(in data tables) column/(Tw) row
abbr. for Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region 寧夏回族自治區|宁夏回族自治区[Ning2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1]/abbr. for Nanjing 南京[Nan2 jing1]/surname Ning
square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively
to rein in/to compel/to force/to carve/to engrave/(literary) to command/to lead/bridle/(physics) abbr. for 勒克斯[le4 ke4 si1], lux

sentences.english: A farewell in Leningrad, in the spring of 1942.
sentences.chinese: 1942年春天，在列宁格勒的一场送别仪式。

sentences.english: Patties made from minced human flesh were on sale at the Leningrad Haymarket .
sentences.chinese: 列宁格勒秣市场上出售的小馅饼，就是以碎人肉作馅。

sentences.english: A city of northwest European U. S. S. R. south-southeast of Leningrad.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲西北苏联内的城市，在列宁格勒的东南偏南。

sentences.english: HAS now been restored in the Palaeontological Museum in Leningrad.
sentences.chinese: 这一猛犸遗骸现已修复陈列在列宁格勒古生物博物馆。

sentences.english: In the north, the Germans closed in on Leningrad.
sentences.chinese: 在北方，德国人包抄了列宁格勒。

sentences.english: He entered Leningrad State University's law department in 1970.
sentences.chinese: 1970年，普京进入列宁格勒州立大学法律系。

sentences.english: The opening ceremony of the St. Petersburg International Economic Forum was held at Leningrad Exhibition Centre, St. Petersburg.
sentences.chinese: 论坛开幕式在圣彼得堡的列宁格勒展览中心举行。

sentences.english: This time we are taking a trip to one of the factories which is located in Leningrad region.
sentences.chinese: 我们这一次的旅程来到位于列宁格勒的一个工厂。

sentences.english: Despite great suffering, however, the people of Leningrad refused to surrender.
sentences.chinese: 尽管忍受着极大困苦，列宁格勒的人民绝不投降。

sentences.english: Another bus going along a street in Leningrad.
sentences.chinese: 在列宁格勒街道上运行的公交汽车。

sentences.english: Pioneer girls are marching somewhere in Leningrad too.
sentences.chinese: 少先队的女孩们在列宁格勒的某处游行。

sentences.english: It was easier to let Leningrad’s inhabitants starve.
sentences.chinese: 让列宁格勒的居民饿死更加简单。

sentences.english: The Leningrad branch of the Institute of Oriental Studies mainly focuses on classic Sinology.
sentences.chinese: 东方研究所列宁格勒分所以研究古典汉学为主。

definition: Petrograd, variant spelling of 彼得堡[Bi3 de2 bao3], Saint Petersburg
Stalingrad, former name of Volvograd 伏爾加格勒|伏尔加格勒 (1925-1961)

pinyin: Sai1 wa3 si1 tuo1 bo1 er3

definition: Soviet Union, 1922-1991/abbr. for Union of Soviet Socialist Republics (USSR) 蘇維埃社會主義共和國聯盟|苏维埃社会主义共和国联盟[Su1 wei2 ai1 She4 hui4 zhu3 yi4 Gong4 he2 guo2 Lian2 meng2]
